discussion.author: joshday
discussion.text: KML is the format used by Google Earth.  A quick google search only contains hits about the KML format, so as far as I know, there's little room for ambiguity about what this package is.

discussion.author: joshday
discussion.text: Bump.  "KML" is more widely recognized than "Keyhole Markup Language" and thus "KML" would be how people search for this package.
